Effect: On Play - [Overcast](2) Summon a Knight Token.n/On Play - Give an allied Token Unit Rush and +1/+0.

Name: Blade Strike
Effect: [Overcast]n/Give an allied Unit Rush. Valor 5: Give that Unit +1+1.

Effect: On Play - Add a Rallying Order Token to your hand. On Destroy - Summon a Knight Token.
